name: Sea Witch
description: Powerful Naga sorceresses who command the fury of the ocean. These spellcasters can unleash devastating water and frost magic upon their enemies.

abilities.name: Frost Nova
abilities.description: Releases a burst of frost energy, dealing 80 damage and freezing enemies for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Tidal Wave
abilities.description: Summons a wave of water that travels forward, dealing 100 damage and knocking back enemies.

abilities.name: Forked Lightning
abilities.description: Calls down lightning that jumps between up to 5 enemies, dealing 60 damage to each.
